changeSet.sql: ALTER VIEW germplasm_trial_details AS select `pr`.`object_project_id` AS `study_id`, `e`.`project_id` AS `project_id`, `e`.`type_id` AS `type_id`, `e`.`nd_geolocation_id` AS `envt_id`, `e`.`type_id` AS `observation_type`, `e`.`nd_experiment_id` AS `experiment_id`, `p`.`phenotype_id` AS `phenotype_id`, `td`.`trait_name` AS `trait_name`, `svd`.`cvterm_id` AS `stdvar_id`, `svd`.`stdvar_name` AS `stdvar_name`, `p`.`value` AS `observed_value`, `s`.`stock_id` AS `stock_id`, `s`.`name` AS `entry_designation`, `g`.`gid` AS `gid` from (((((((((`stock` `s` join `nd_experiment_stock` `es` ON ((`es`.`stock_id` = `s`.`stock_id`))) join `nd_experiment` `e` ON ((`e`.`nd_experiment_id` = `es`.`nd_experiment_id`)))) join `nd_experiment_phenotype` `epx` ON ((`epx`.`nd_experiment_id` = `e`.`nd_experiment_id`))) join `phenotype` `p` ON ((`p`.`phenotype_id` = `epx`.`phenotype_id`))) join `standard_variable_details` `svd` ON ((`svd`.`cvterm_id` = `p`.`observable_id`))) join `trait_details` `td` ON ((`td`.`trait_id` = `svd`.`property_id`))) join `project_relationship` `pr` ON ((`pr`.`subject_project_id` = `e`.`project_id`))) join `germplsm` `g` ON ((`s`.`dbxref_id` = `g`.`gid`))) where ((`e`.`type_id` = 1170) or ((`e`.`type_id` = 1155) and (1 = (select count(0) from `project_relationship` where ((`project_relationship`.`object_project_id` = `pr`.`object_project_id`) and (`project_relationship`.`type_id` = 1150)))))) order by `e`.`project_id` , `e`.`nd_geolocation_id` , `e`.`type_id` , `td`.`trait_name` , `s`.`name`;
